name: Cube Escape
description:
Hop, roll, and flip your way through the colorful mazes of Cube Escape.

Match the color or spots on the bottom face of the cube with the color of the tile to proceed. Find your way to the finish line, with bonus stars for getting there in the fewest possible moves.

Puzzle solve against the clock in race mode. Get as far as you can down the track before the collapse catches up with you.

Use the included level editor to create your own levels and share them with the world via the Steam Workshop.

Features:

  • Twisty turny puzzle design.
  • Level Editor: Create and share your own unique levels with friends!
  • 15 Levels included, with more available on the Steam Workshop.
  • Colorblind mode with spots replacing colors.
  • Race mode: think fast!
